text: The Trouble with Romance is a 2007 comedy-drama film directed by Gene Rhee and starring Kip Pardue, David Eigenberg, Roger Fan, Josie Davis, Sheetal Sheth, and Coby Ryan McLaughlin. ==External links== * Category:2007 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:2007 comedy- drama films Category:American comedy-drama films Category:2007 comedy films Category:2007 drama films
title: The Trouble with Romance
